Html:
This one should be pretty easy but I just started using this library and still can't figure it out.
After I populate an Undirected graph I want to find all the vertices connected (directly and indirectly) to a particular Vertex.
What would be a simple way to do this?
Thanks a lot

You can do an undirected depth first search starting from that node.
Hook to the DiscoverVertex to see the vertices being touched by the DFS.

Thanks for the quick reply. That solved my problem.
Btw, great piece of code you got there
